Class InvoicesBusinessLogic

java.lang.Object
net.tangly.erp.invoices.services.InvoicesBusinessLogic
public class InvoicesBusinessLogic extends Object
The business logic and rules of the bounded domain for invoices entities.

    • createWith

      public Invoice createWith(@NotNull @NotNull Invoice invoice)
      Semantically copy an invoice. The identifier and all invoice dates are not copied.
      Parameters:
      invoice - invoice prototype to copy
      Returns:
      a new copied invoice instance
